data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Ratchaburi unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ratchaburi, Thailand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 5,713 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary: On average, 76 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ratchaburi, Thailand.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Ratchaburi, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Ratchaburi, Thailand, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Mlabri people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, remind your church in Ratchaburi, Thailand that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 883,600 citizens of Ratchaburi, Thailand, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ratchaburi, Thailand has a population of 883,600.

We estimate Ratchaburi has 5,713 people who might know Jesus, 5,832 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 872,054 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Ratchaburi access to a Bible in their own language.
